Name: Plasmarena
About the game: Plasmarena is a graphically abstract top down arena shooter where you can blast your friends to pieces without rhyme or reason for as long as you like! In an arena setting with 2-5 players, you will all be pitted against one another in a battle to the digital death, and then you will do it again, and again, etc. Connect with your friends via LAN or through Steam and let the destruction commence! - Up to 5 players via steam or LAN connections - Endless fast-paced bullet-hell arena combat - Colorful visuals
Meta Title: Plasmarena: Feb 1, 2023, Wolf Noselo and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Plasmarena? Check out the release date (Feb 1, 2023), developer insights from Wolf Noselo, and a complete game summary.
